name: starter_golden_set
description: Golden questions for evaluating a PDF RAG chatbot on this thesis proposal. expected_pages are 1-indexed and optional.

items.question: What problem is this thesis proposal trying to solve, and why is it important in healthcare or indoor environments?
What is the core idea of the proposed solution (UV-C fluorescence imaging), and what fluorescence/physics concepts does it rely on?
What specific wavelengths are used (or targeted) for saliva excitation and emission, and what filter band is used on the camera?
Describe the imaging hardware and setup: camera model/modification, lens choice, UV-C panel specs, and geometry (FoV, distances, positioning).
How will data be collected and what detection/segmentation approach is planned (including what varies across trials and what metrics are used)?
